name: Hentai University 2: Biology course
description:
There is a special university in a different universe... A legend says that after visiting it, you come to know yourself and all the secrets of the universe… On your arrival at this mysterious institution, you meet charming teachers who are ready to do anything that would teach you everything they know and apply the knowledge in practice. Each lesson becomes more difficult, but do not lose heart, the reward will worth it.


Description of the game:
- The game is based on the "Match3" mechanics.
- You will see extremely beautiful landscapes and wonderful teachers.
- Each teacher has a unique subject that will help you conquer her.
- Many skills to improve the abilities of the hero.
- Victory depends on the use of certain skills.
